system.requirements:
Tier 3; Crushing Blow
Aptitudes: Strength, Offence, Khorne
system.effect:
Whenever a character makes an All Out Attack Action to make a single melee attack. They may add half their Strength Bonus to the weapon's Penetration value, additionally, the attack counts as having Concussive(2) Special Quality.
Concussive(2): Target makes -20 Toughness Test, failiure stuns for 1 round per degree of failiure. If damage is greater than Target's Strength bonus, knock them prone.
